text: @realDonaldTrump We're winning? Meanwhile the stock markets are down 30 percent, 17 million persons have filed for unemployment; entire industries are shut down, more people are contracting the COVID-19 virus, consumers continued 2 b locked out, uncertainty dominates, yet we r winning?
